transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan Gopal ji Himanshu aap bol rahe IndiaMART se.

Customer: Boliye.

Executive: Theek hai ji kaise ho?

Customer: Abhi tak to theek hai.

Executive: Abhi tak theek hai, achha. Sir ye aapne concern bhi aaya tha aapne Sunil se bhi discussion kiya tha leads ke regarding right?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: To thoda sa to time dijiye sir platform pe aur.

Customer: Nahi sir maine bahut samay de diya. Last baar bhi aapne agar dekho aap mera payment refund karte ho to theek hai. Nahi karte koi issue nahi hai main ye cheez social media pe dal dunga. At least main sakta hu dusra nahi sakta chahiye bas. Sir kya mera to nuksan ho gaya. Mera to aapne to mera nuksan kar diya mere ko loss kar diya. Service to sath me dusra nuksan I am sure itna main aapko ensure kar sakta hu. Kuch nahi to hamara pura industry pura Rajasthan mein aapko kam se kam ek crore business loss jarur hoga I am sure. Sure hai. Main media mein dal dunga aur itna social media pe chala dunga ki sure hai. Mere kam se kam 5000 followers hai. 5000.

Executive: Gopal ji with due respect sir matlab hum aapke liye kya kare batao to aapne mujhe bola ki aapke jo sales maine unhone mujhe bewakoof banaya aap hamara paisa refund kare. Anya anya sir main bhi karunga sure hai.

Customer: Nahi paisa refund. Sir haan.

Executive: Saat mahine ho gaye is cheez ko aapne bola ki 5000. Paanch mahine se aapka mujhe sales person bewakoof bana raha hai.

Customer: Kaun se sales person jo field wale aate hai unki baat kar rahe ho ya fir jo aapke abhi currently jo services dekhte hai unki baat kar rahe ho aap?

Executive: Abhi dono dono sir aapka online wale bhi bata raha hai aur ye bhi bata raha hai. Rakesh Sharma jo aapka offline hai aur jo Himanshu online.

Executive: Himanshu to main hu sir.

Customer: Haan aapke Himanshu kya sir ek madam thi pehle madam ka naam unka haan haan pehle aur bhi log theek hai. Main dal dunga aapko kyuki ab main bahut pareshan ho gaya hu present ho gaya hu taki mere ko aapne bewakoof banaya aap dusra nahi bana payenge sir itna sure hai. Nahi to aap keh rahe ho pehle do teen se sir aap mujhe do teen dijiye aap mujhko kuch nahi satisfaction kar payenge main aapse nivedan kar raha hu ki ya to aap ek do din mein mere payment karaiye ya main aapki ye 100% post dal dunga. Taki baki log to nahi fasenge kam se kam mere loss man liya aapko kam se kam to aapka mera loss 30000 33000 aur aapka minimum 1 crore ka jarur karwa dunga sure hai.

Executive: Suniye sir ek cheez sir to aise bhi sir refund to saat mahine chal gaya service service to paanch mahine ki bachi hai aapki.

Customer: Saat mahine se aapki aapki company mujhe bewakoof bana rahi hai aapke sales maine sales manager first month se mujhe bewakoof bana raha hai first month.

Executive: Kya bol rahe ho kya aisi kya baat kar di sir aapke sath?

Customer: Yahi to baat aapko bataya mere ko system lead hi nahi mil raha hai. Aapko sir ye milega aapko wo milega aapko lead milegi aap lead kaha aaj tak ek lead nahi mil payi mujhe to mera to loss hi hai na.

Executive: Dekho lead ki baat hai to lead ke liye to hum baithe hai sir leads mein aapko koi problem nahi aayegi sir lead mein to aapke liye koi problem nahi aayegi uske liye to hum discuss kar lete hai aur leads ka abhi bhi dikh raha hai lead ka time se nahi nahi aata lekin second aapki lead expire ho jati hai to ye to pata nahi kya scam hai. Expire is vajah se hoti hai na ki aisi category nahi hai sir haan within second within two three seconds jaise hi receive aaya within two three seconds what is this that is scam 100% sure. Sir demand hai sir aapke jo marble ke sir category to aapne ye cheez mujhe bataya hi na aapke sales person ne ki within second aapka expire ho jayega to ye kya hai bewakoof bana. Sir time period nahi koi identify hai wo to depend karta hai ki agar wo within second bhi ho sakta hai 10 minute mein bhi ho sakta hai paanch minute bhi ho but isse ye pata chalta hai ki kitna demand hai aapka sales person mujhe bata tha to main nahi leta na sir.

Customer: Main nahi leta. But abhi bhi to consumption to hamara reh raha hai na sir jo buylead hai main abhi dekh I don't know sir I don't care aap mujhe apna refund karwae anya sir main aapka Gopal sir to theek hai refund dekho aap bol rahe ho main mere se baat suno ek baar meri baat bhi sun lijiye pehli baar baat ho rahi hai aapke sath main aapko refund mein mail bhi kar deta hu sure hai taki aap mujhe baad me aap ye bol sakte hai ki aapne mujhe inform nahi kiya main aapko refund mein mail bhi kar raha hu. Sir aapne aapne call kar liya customer care pe wo enough hai to aapko mail karne ki bhi requirement nahi hai wo jo discussion hui hai main to concern ki baat hai na to uske liye to aapka waise bhi aapka mera dono ka recording chali raha hoga sure right okay.

Customer: To main aapko nivedan kar raha hu sir main nahi chahta aapka wo nuksan ho bada nuksan ho aap mera paisa refund karwa dijiye. Main samajh gaya Gopal sir but mujhe to aapne keh liya apni baat ki aapko band karana hai paisa chahiye but meri baat bhi to ek baar sun lijiye sir ek baar to karne dijiye leads ki jahan tak hai sir aap actively active bhi rehte ho system pe right aur buylead bhi purchase kar rahe ho theek hai har mahine 50 60 to buylead aap purchase kar ke mujhe first month se aapka aapka first month se aapke jo sales person hai sir aap active rahiye active rahiye active 24 ghante active rahunga kya? Nahi 24 ghante nahi 12 ghante reh sakta hu 12 hours reh sakta hu par mera jarurat nahi hai 24 ghante koi bhi rahe sir actively sir I just theek hai aapki feedback maine le liya aapko matlab benefit nahi hai bilkul bhi che mahine se paanch mahine se aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye kuch leads ka main feedback lunga sir please I just request aap reply kijiye ga last aapne 15 November ko buylead purchase kiya tha ek Kota policy stone ka chapralal jisse Mysore ka right 2 lakh ka order tha sir 6000 ki quantity sir inse baat hui aapki wo same dikha tha aapka aap contact jitni bhi main buylead diye har ek vyakti se baat karna aap feedback main mere hamare paas detail nahi hoti hai sir but main aapke paas janna chahta hu detail nahi hai aap feedback le na sab se ji jitni bhi maine buylead diye aap sab buylead pe contact kare aur feedback le mera business hua kya unse nahi aap bata doge wo enough hai sir matlab aap dekho order aapne mujhe jo cheez bola tha hamari team ko aap meri baat pe shanti nahi kariye aap to khud usme Gopal sahab wo hum hume authorize nahi hota ki hum jaake waha aap jo bologe wo main manunga aapka fraud hai authorize hai ya nahi hai but main aapko bata raha hu Gopal sir Gopal sir ek baar to meri baatein sun lijiye do cheez ka mujhe feedback aaya tha meri team se ki aapko isko itne square 5000 square feet ka order chahiye plus aapka order value 2 se 4 lakh ka hona chahiye 14 November ko aapne buylead purchase kiya jo ki 14 lakh se 32 lakh ka order value aap kyu time waste kar rahe hai mera aur aapka convince nahi kar raha main just feedback le raha hu aapne abhi tak suni aap main aapko samay dunga ek minute ka mere ko aapka ye nahi lena aap mera refund karwae ya main aapko are sir main samajh gaya aapko refund chahiye but aap mujhe nahi chahiye aapka ye okay sir ab usme koi discussion nahi chahiye sir reason kya hai ye to batao sir aapne lead bata diya sir aapko quantity ki baat thi to quantity wale lead to purchase kar rahe ho na aap sir aap ek bhi business convert hua kya mera sir conversion ka nahi hai data hamare paas hum lead aapko provide kare iska data hai sir 2 se 5 lakh ka order bhi hai aap confirm kare na sir mere ko business nahi mil raha aapko IndiaMART kabhi aapko confirm lead ki to promise nahi karta na sir ji sir confirm lead ki nahi aap baat hi nahi samajh rahe yaar within second mein aapki lead expire ho jati hai ye baat mujhe hidden thi na mujhe bata ke main nahi leta na sir yaar aap baat kyu badal rahe to aapke sir aapki 60 valid hum monthly dete hai sir aur weekly aapko sir aap meri baat suniye aap strictly sir expire ho gaya to kya ho gaya sir expire ho gaya to kya ho gaya aapki to requirement fulfill ho rahi hai na sir aapki jo authorized buylead hai saat buylead plus ek daily ka 10 buylead aur ek daily ka bonus buylead wo to aap fulfill kar rahe ho sir aap bata rahe hai aapke according saat mahine ho gaye saat mahine mein ek buylead bhi mera nahi receive hua okay receive nahi hua matlab mujhe satisfied nahi hua bas baat khatam to satisfied hum convert to aap karoge na sir hum to aapko lead denge na maine puri puri koshish kari hai mere ko aaj tak buylead confirm convert nahi hui second thing aur within second jo badhiya buylead hoti hai wo sold out ho jati hai but kuch aise hi aap meri baat sunenge main phone rakh dunga aap meri baat suniye boliye boliye main to sunne ke liye call kiya bataiye na ya to aap meri baat sunenge ya main aapki baat sunu pehle bataiye nahi nahi aap boliye aapne aap hi sununga pehle bataiye aap boliye please aapko ek minute ka samay dunga pura main theek hai aap boliye main keh raha hu ki aapki jo problem hai ki sold out ho jati hai buylead but aapka same day ka sara valid consumption hai jo ki bulk order ka hai to ab yaha hum lead provide kar rahe hai mature nahi ho raha wo alag problem hai sir but aap keh rahe ho sold out ho raha hai to sold out wali bhi hai problem but aapka jo MDC package hai usme jo 17 valid milta hai utna valid to aap karna consume kar hi rahe ho sir 60 valid har mahine aap consume kar rahe ho ye mera kehna hai haan boliye aap kya kehna cha rahe ho bol diya haan mature nahi hua wo alag baat hai but aap consume kar pa rahe ho sun liya aapne haan boliye sir boliye aap mere ko aapka package nahi chahiye refund chahiye sir ye to ek baat hai ye to alag hi baat ho gayi na sir maine bol diya aapko mera mere ko aapka package nahi chahiye mere ko aapne fraud kiya hai scam kiya hai mere sath main aap mera payment refund kare ya fir main isko social media newspaper aur case dono teeno cheez karne wala hu Gopal ji to mujhe batao na kya kya scam hua hai ye to bataiye mujhe sir kya scam hua hai ye aapko main social media ke through bata paunga theek hai mera legal advisor aapko Gopal sahab wahi to baat hai na saat mahine ke baad aap ek cheez bol rahe ho ki scam hua hai paanch mahine saat mahine se main aapki sales person online sab dur complaint kar chuka hu aap meri complaint dekhiye pehle fir baat dekhiye complaint sir dekh liya but jo problem aap bata first month se meri complaint hai theek hai but jo but buylead ka jo hai sir buylead ki jo bulk buylead ki baat kar rahe ho 5000 square feet ki jo order value ki baat kar rahe ho to hum dono ka samay waste kar rahe hai sir main clarity clear kar raha hu aapse aap keh rahe ho waste kar rahe hai main to clear kar raha hu aapse sir nahi mere ko nahi chahiye sir aap mera aapne higher authority se bol dijiye ya to main mail kar du ya aap bolo to main seedha newspaper mein dal ke ya social media Gopal ji aap wahi kar rahe hai na ki jab hum discussion karne baithe ho aap mail kar do aapko no more discussion sir mere paas itna samay nahi hai sir maine aapse bol diya mujhe nahi chahiye matlab nahi chahiye hum lead to hum provide kar rahe hai na hum business kaise aapko mature kar ke de de sir hum thodi convert convert to aap karoge na nahi karta hu maafi chahta hu convert to aap karoge na kis cheez ki maafi mang rahe ho convert to aap karoge na koi discussion nahi chahta okay Gopal Gopal ji aap main aapse request kar raha hu aap abhi aaj ka din hai aapka jo bhi mujhe sold out kar dena nahi to main kal ye sab cheez social media sir mujhe bataiye aapki jo problem hai usko solve karunga na sir aap keh rahe ho refund kar do refund refund kyu kar de refund kyu kar de wo to batao na aap mujhe refund kyu kar de sir refund iska jawab aapke sales person Rakesh Sharma se baat kariye wo bataiye theek hai sir kyuki aapki already bulk order ki sir mujhe unhone mere sath fraud scam kiya hai main unke naam aur number ke sath pura sab kuch dalunga theek hai kaun hai Rakesh Sharma aapka sales RSE mein aapka regional sales manager hai yaha Rakesh Rakesh Bhardwaj haan Rakesh Bhardwaj theek hai ab phone bhi nahi uthata mera first first of month se main usko complaint kar raha hu mera phone bhi nahi receive karta theek hai ye sab cheeze main us pe social media pe mention karunga sir aap ye na samjhe sir kam se kam mera to 33 mein loss hai par IndiaMART ka main samajh gaya aapki baat aap satisfied sabhi isme aap keh rahe ho sari cheeze main samajh gaya aapki baat ko but un cheeze mein koi hume bhi to agar aapki problem solve mein 50 50000 person jude hue hai mere se kitne 50000 to aapka kam se kam main 50 1 crore ka to loss kar hi dunga sure hai hmm koi baat nahi sir aap mere ko one dijiye theek hai na main aapko specially bol hi raha hu taki aap mere se ye nahi bol payenge maine aapko inform nahi kiya without information sure hai aur main case bhi karunga likh lijiye hmm sir but mujhe ek baar aap mauka nahi de rahe bilkul bhi kaam karne ka main aapne bahut mauka de diya maine aapko saat mahine se aap mauke mang raha sir sir main har vyakti ki baat nahi aapko saat mahine se sir leads ki discussion kar lete hai na leads ka to hai hi na available sir waha pe leads aapka business main to business ke liye wo main kar ke deta hu sir nahi chahiye nahi chahiye sorry aap to ek kaam kare mera refund kare aaj se sun le jaise kal main aapko dal dunga sure theek hai isliye bol raha hu kal main social media newspaper aur case confirm kar dunga taki kam se kam mere sath loss hua pure kam se kam pure India mein aapko loss nahi hona chahiye kisi person ko aapne jo bewakoof banaya scam kiya fraud hai aap IndiaMART fraud
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for IndiaMART subscription.

- Alleges sales representatives misled him.

- Claims to have suffered financial loss.

- States leads expire too quickly.

- Threatens legal action and social media campaign.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to mail refund details.

- Executive tried to explain lead generation process.

- Executive took feedback on lead quality.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will post on social media.



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud, complaint, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry | Risk of churn -> Risk of churn



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, social media, fraud
